content:
can we add some css without having to change templates, e.g. adding a file like
input/assets/css/mycss.css
?

Not that can stick stuff under assets/css, though you could put a css directly in root. Trick is you'd have to reference it on every page you want to use it on as you'd need to change a template to get it referenced everywhere
To copy it directly across, stick it in your images folder
